0.name: Kageuchi - Break
0.effect: When lightning damage is dealt, increase lightning damage by 5%, last for 4 seconds, stacks up to 4 times. Triggering it again will refresh the duration. Gain 10% extra damage after releasing ultimate, last for 10 seconds, triggering it again will refresh the duration.

1.name: Sirius
1.effect: Increase all damage by 5%. Accumulates energy based on number of orbs consumed. At 50 energy, summon Sirius for 45 seconds. CD: 60s

2.name: Red Sakura
2.effect: Gain 2% increase in physical damage for every orb consumed for 5s, stackable up to 10 times. Gain 1 additional sword wave orb in sword wave mode, CD: 10s

3.name: Red Lotus Fanatic
3.effect: 10% damage increase to basic attacks. Every basic attack increases physical damage by 5% for 2s, stackable up to 5 times, duration can be renewed

4.name: Zero-Degree Target
4.effect: S Lee's core passive deals 10% more damage, increase physical damage by 15% after a 3 orb skill for 5s, duration can be renewed.

5.name: Wolf Eater
5.effect: All damage increase by 20% when attacking enemies within the burning area

6.name: God Giver
6.effect: 10% damage increase for 5s to allies within 5m radius for every 12 orbs consumed. Deal 10% more damage to rooted enemies

7.name: Sky Wind Dragon
7.effect: Basic attacks have a 10% chance to weaken enemies, decreasing their damage by 10% for 5s, duration can be renewed. 10% chance to recover an orb when attacking weakened enemies, CD: 6s

8.name: Type Zero
8.effect: Damage of B Liv's Red Orb skill is increased by 50%. Increase damage by 15% for 5s after using a 3 orb skill, duration can be renewed

9.name: Ramiel
9.effect: 15% increase to ultimate damage. Increase target's physical damage received by 2% for every hit landed by the Ultimate skill, duration 5s, stackable up to 8 times, duration can be renewed

10.name: Chimera - Break
10.effect: 20% chance to cause target to enter Damaged status when attacking, dealing 2% of physical damage every second for 3s, stackable up to 10 times, duration can be renewed. Chances are doubled on enemies suffering from Defense Down. 10% increase to physical damage when attacking Damaged enemies

11.name: Verve
11.effect: 10% chance to decrease enemy's fire resistance by 5% when attacking, duration 5s, CD: 8s for each enemy. Fire damage increased by 20% after ultimate and doubles the chance of decreasing enemy's fire resistance

12.name: Big Kamui
12.effect: Increase physical damage by 15%. Next skill damage is increased by 30% when you successfully counter an enemy

13.name: Pitch Black
13.effect: 20% increase to physical damage and dark damage by 20% after consuming 3 orbs, lasts for 5s, duration can be renewed

14.name: Frenzy Fusion Cannon
14.effect: Increase physical damage by 10%. After consuming 3 orbs at once, basic attack damage is increased by 30%, for 5s, duration can be renewed

15.name: Nuclear Dragon
15.effect: Increase fire damage by 10%. When consuming a red orb, fire damage increases by 10% for 5s, duration can be renewed

16.name: Soul Slayer
16.effect: When a critical hit is dealt from the opponent's rear, the target suffers from Damaged status, receiving 50% physical damage every second for 3s, duration can be renewed. When attacking Damaged enemies, physical damage increases by 20%

17.name: Kuji No Ken
17.effect: Attacks have a 20% chance of triggering a lightning strike, dealing 50% physical damage, CD: 3s

18.name: Shadow Violet
18.effect: Within 5s of consuming red, yellow and blue orbs, increase all damage by 15% for 5s, duration can be renewed

19.name: Guardian Mount
19.effect: Obtain a random orb for every 30 combo, CD: 8s

20.name: Saker E-3320
20.effect: Critical chance and Critical damage increase by 10% when there are no enemies within 2m

21.name: Tourmaline Fire
21.effect: 30% chance to cause armor break while attacking, decrease defense by 5% for 3s, stackable up to 5 times, duration can be renewed

22.name: Star Of Bethlehem
22.effect: Create a christmas halo when a 3-orb is performed . Attack and movement speed is increased by 8% within the halo. The halo lasts for 15s, CD: 30s

23.name: Accel Greatsword
23.effect: Attacks have a 10% chance to release a shockwave, dealing 100% physical damage to enemies within range

24.name: Pillar Of Lava
24.effect: Damage is increased by 12% after consuming 3 orbs at once for 4s, duration can be renewed

25.name: Heartstone
25.effect: After consecutive 3 orb combos, 15% increase to all damage for 5s, duration can be renewed

26.name: Red Fireworks
26.effect: Create explosions at target's location when dealing damage in cannon mode or fire mode, dealing a total of 250% of physical damage, 10 seconds cooldown

27.name: Lantern Night
27.effect: When dealing damage to an enemy, 20% chance to drop a lantern that deals 15% physical damage. 1 second cooldown.

28.name: Faded
28.effect: All damage increases by 10% for 4 seconds after releasing QTE or 3 orbs, duration can be renewed

29.name: Violet Wu
29.effect:
Passive 1: When dealing damage to shielded enemies, increase all damage by 2%. Stacks 3 times and lasts for 5 seconds, duration can be renewed.
Passive 2: Stun for 2s when the opponent's shield is broken, 10s cd on the same enemy. 
Passive III: After releasing Colorflow's core passive, increase all physical damage done by 15%. Lasts for 7 seconds, duration can be renewed

30.name: Suzume
30.effect:
Passive 1: All damage done is increased by 10%.
Passive 2: When in resonance form, all dark damage done is increased by 10%

31.name: Sin
31.effect:
Passive 1: All damage increases by 3% for 5s for every energy orb you pick up, stacks up to 5 times.
Passive 2: After picking up 5 energy orbs, gain 1 extra skill orb and 10 energy, 10 seconds cooldown.

32.name: Lightning
32.effect:
Passive 1: 15% lightning damage increase.
Passive 2: Triggers a lightning strike when a target is hit 5 times by lightning element skills, dealing 150% lightning damage, 2 seconds cooldown.

33.name: Saint Elmo
33.effect:
Passive 1: 10% more lightning damage
Passive 2: When in Flash (Ultimate) mode, reduces the amount of normal attacks required to trigger core passive to 3.

34.name: Julia
34.effect:
Passive 1: 15% increase in ice damage.
Passive 2: 10% increase in all damage after a 3 orb combo, last for 5 seconds.

35.name: Thanatos
35.effect:
Passive I: 15% additional damage increase.
Passive II: When Camu is in Berserker mode, Thanatos will grant 10% dark damage increase to all allies on field.

36.name: Sariel
36.effect:
Passive I: 15% dark damage increase
Passive II: 15% chance to create a dark shockwave when attacking, dealing 75% dark damage, 0.5 seconds cooldown.

37.name: Gungnir
37.effect: When dealing damage, decrease target's physical defense by 20%, lasts for 8 seconds, triggering the effect again will refresh the duration. When dealing damage with a small/medium/wide type railgun shot, target receives 25/50/100% physical damage based on your attack damage for 8s.

38.name: Qing Hyuk
38.effect:
Passive 1: 20% physical damage increase.
Passive 2: Peafowl's attack rate is increased by 50% and Peafowl gains a new skill: **Curse**.
**Curse**: Peafowl morphs into a talisman that sticks onto its targets, dealing up to 420% physical damage. After a short delay, it explodes and deal 480% physical damage. The damage increases with Qu's ultimate level.

39.name: Baji
39.effect:
Passive 1: 15% ice damage increase.
Passive 2: After releasing QTE or ORAORAORA, an ice mirror will form beneath of Chang Yu that lasts for 8 seconds.

40.name: Guiyun
40.effect: Passive: Gain 10% physical damage after consuming a blue orb, lasts 5 seconds. Recasting blue orb will refresh the skill.

41.name: White Qilin
41.effect: Passive: 8% additional damage increase after dodging, lasts 4 seconds.

42.name: Crown Lure
42.effect: 15% all damage increase if 3 different colored orbs are consumed within 6 seconds, lasts for 8 seconds.

43.name: Ozma
43.effect:
Passive 1: 15% dark damage increase.
Passive 2: The 4th Annihilation Orb will deal an additional 100% AOE dark damage.

44.name: Virtuous Contract {+ Virtuous Treaty} · Kai
44.effect:
Passive 1: **15%** Physical Damage Increase.
Passive 2: Leader skill effect is **doubled** {8% > 16% Physical Damage Increase, 25 > 50 Ultimate Energy}.
Passive 3: Switching into the stage will gain you 240 **Stance Stability**, enter **Battle Stance** upon entry and gain **2** additional stacks of **Data Correction.

45.name: Cruel Oath · Kai
45.effect:
Passive 1: **15%** Physical Damage and Healing Effectiveness Increase.
Passive 2: Leader skill effect is **doubled** {8% > 16% Physical Damage Increase, 10 > 20% Additional Damage Reduction}.
**Overload Indicator is successfully released, the switch cooldown for 2B and A2 is decreased by **1** second, and a random orb will be gained.

46.name: Type-40 Lance · Kai
46.effect:
Passive 1: Leader skill effect is **doubled** {8% > 16% Physical Damage Increase, 200> 400 Dodge Bar Limit increase}.
A2 can enter Berserker Mode when **POD:Shield** is at **40%** {Previously 100%}, at the same time, she gains **10%** Damage Increase in **Berserker Mode**.
 Within **2** seconds after slow-mo or pressing the dodge button, hold your basic attack button to release an Empowered Attack that deals **370.59%** physical damage, if it lands, you can do a follow-up with the attack button again, which deals a total of **720.59%** physical damage (damage increases as Normal Attack's level increases).The Empowered Attack will consume **all Yellow Orbs** as fuel for Type-40, each Yellow Orb consumed will cause an additional **100%** (up to **300%**) Physical Damage, and gives **3% POD: Shield** {3% per orb, no limit}. At the same time, if any amount of Yellow Orbs are consumed, A2 will gain a **10%** Physical Damage Increase that lasts for 15 seconds.

47.name: Master of the Forest
47.effect:
Passive 1: 20% Lightning Damage Increase.
Passive 2: **Blue Orb** and **Red Orb** can now be cast during other skill orb animations, but cannot be cast consecutively.
Passive 3: When your sea of consciousness exits Chaos Mode, orbs are returned based on the number of orbs in possession before entering Chaos Mode. Skill orbs are returned in 3 orb orders {if possible}.
